name: Bobby The Root
description:
This game whas make in 48h during the Global Game Jam.
Link to the GGJ Site : https://globalgamejam.org/2023/games/humans-0

Bobby The Root it's a game about a little forest spirit who want to help humans to build their civilization

From your underground you will plant seeds that will modify the surface to help humans survive.

Controls : 

  • Left arrow and Right arrow : Move
  • Espace : Pick up a seed / Drop a seed 
  • E : Plant a seed

Have fun playing !
